name: The Emerald Boost (Green Smoothie)
description: Start your day with a burst of green energy! *The Emerald Boost* is a perfect blend of fresh spinach, ripe banana for natural sweetness, tropical mango, and a hint of ginger for a refreshing, warm sensation. Blended smoothly with coconut water for maximum hydration, this drink is the easiest and quickest way to get your daily greens intake.

name: Ruby Cleanse (Detox Juice)
description: Experience a deep cleanse from within with *Ruby Cleanse*. This juice combines the detoxifying power of beets, the sweetness of carrots and apples, and a touch of lemon for freshness. The deep ruby ​​color signifies its richness in antioxidants that help your body fight free radicals. Perfect for rebooting your system.

name: Golden Immunity (Tonic Drink)
description: Make Golden Immunity your daily shield. This warming drink is a powerful blend of fresh turmeric, ginger, freshly squeezed orange juice, and a pinch of black pepper to maximize curcumin absorption. Functions as a natural anti-inflammatory and a powerful immune system booster.

name: Post-Workout Power (Protein Shake)
description: Replenish your energy and repair your muscles after a workout with Post-Workout Power. A blend of chocolate-flavored plant-based protein, frozen banana for a creamy texture, natural peanut butter for healthy fats, and oat milk. It tastes as delicious as a milkshake, but is specifically designed to support your fitness goals.

name: Berry Glow Smoothie
description: Get radiant skin that glows from within! *Berry Glow Smoothie* is a blend of antioxidant-rich berries (strawberries, blueberries, raspberries) blended with banana, chia seeds, and almond milk. This delicious drink helps nourish your skin and leaves it looking fresher and more radiant.

name: Moonlight Latte (Calming Drink)
description: Unwind after a long day with a *Moonlight Latte*. This calming, caffeine-free drink is made with butterfly pea flowers, which produce a beautiful purplish-blue color, warm oat milk, a hint of honey, and a pinch of cinnamon. It's the perfect companion for unwinding before bed.

name: Hydra Green (Hydrating Juice)
description: Quench your thirst in the healthiest way. *Hydra Green* is a very light and hydrating juice made with cucumber, celery, green apple, and fresh mint leaves. With very low calories, this drink is an ideal choice for staying hydrated throughout the day without guilt.

name: Tropical Vitality
description: Experience a tropical vacation in one glass! *Tropical Vitality* is a refreshing blend of sweet mango, vitamin C-rich pineapple, and exotic passion fruit, blended with pure coconut water. This drink is not only delicious, but also provides an instant, natural energy boost.

name: Sunrise Chicory Latte
description: Looking for a caffeine-free coffee experience? Try the *Sunrise Chicory Latte*. Roasted chicory root delivers a rich, slightly bitter, coffee-like flavor, paired with warm almond milk and a hint of natural sweetener. It provides focused energy in the morning without the jitters of caffeine.

name: Dragon's Kiss Smoothie
description: A drink as beautiful as it tastes. The *Dragon's Kiss Smoothie* gets its bright pink color from real dragon fruit (pitaya), blended with strawberries, bananas, and coconut milk for a creamy, exotic flavor. Rich in fiber and antioxidants, this smoothie is excellent for digestion and overall health.
